body:
- `ftgl` needs to create its own `configure` script, therefore the `automake`, `autoconf`, ... dependencies
- `configure_directory` modification:
   + `ftgl-2.1.2` has the following directory distribution once downloaded, so a change of directory is required: 

```
ftgl-2.1.2-3xaq26mkzqunxhp463tfttgyjzg5oecj
   FTGL/
        COPYING.txt  
        README.txt  
        demo  
        include      
        mac              
        src              
        unix
        spack-build.out  
        test  
        win32_vcpp
        HISTORY.txt
        cleanup     
        docs  
        license.txt  
        spack-build.env  
```

  + However this happens to be only for the `2.1.2` version, a more recent `2.1.3-rc5` version does not contain this distribution so the modification of the `configure_directory` would not be needed. Note: this `2.1.3-rc5` has not been included for being a release-candidate.
title: Add new package: ftgl
